Recommended Reviews [Learn more about reviews.](https://www.yelp.com/reviews-trust-link-tree?l=en_US) Overall rating 5 stars 4 stars 3 stars 2 stars 1 star - 5/4/2023First to Review I had an incredible experience with Danielle during our Kambo treatment done in the Sapo method! From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warmth and kindness. Danielle was incredibly knowledgeable about the practice of Kambo/Sapo, and took the time to explain the process and answer any questions I had. During the ceremony, she created a safe and supportive space for me to fully experience the benefits of Kambo. I felt completely comfortable and at ease, knowing that I was in the hands of a skilled practitioner. After the ceremony, I noticed a significant improvement in my overall well-being. I felt more energized and focused, and experienced a heightened sense of clarity and connection. I am truly grateful to Danielle for sharing her gift and helping me to achieve such profound results. Overall, I would highly recommend Spiritual Candy to anyone looking to improve their physical and emotional health. Thank you for everything! Love you Danielle!
